mapper.select: SELECT o.F01 AS id, o.F04 AS orderTime, o.F08 AS userId FROM s65.t6501 o INNER JOIN s65.t6502 r ON o.f01 = r.f01 WHERE r.F07 = 900 AND o.F03 = 'DQR' AND o.F02 = '10001' AND o.F04 <= #{requestTime} ORDER BY o.F01 ASC LIMIT 100
mapper.update: UPDATE S65.T6501 SET F03 = #{status}, F06 = #{completeTime} WHERE F01 = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(F04),0) FROM s71.t7150 WHERE F02 = #{userId} AND F03 = 'WLZH' AND F05 = 'YCZ' AND F10 > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{hours} HOUR) LIMIT 1

SELECT b.F04 bankCode, b.F02 bankName, l.single_limit singleLimit, l.daily_limit dailyLimit, l.monthly_limit monthlyLimit, l.minimum minimum,channel_type channelCode FROM flb.t_payment_limit l INNER JOIN s50.t5020 b ON l.bank_id = b.F01 WHERE b.F03 = 'QY'
AND l.channel_type = #{channelCode}
AND l.channel_type = 101
AND b.F04 = #{bankCode} limit 1

SELECT b.F04 bankCode, b.F02 bankName, l.single_limit singleLimit, l.daily_limit dailyLimit, l.monthly_limit monthlyLimit, l.minimum minimum,channel_type channelCode FROM flb.t_payment_limit l INNER JOIN s50.t5020 b ON l.bank_id = b.F01 WHERE b.F03 = 'QY' AND b.F07 IS NOT NULL AND l.channel_type = 101
